original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord, following the ways of his father and committing the same sin his father had caused Israel to commit.
korean_text: 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그의 아버지의 길로 행하며 그가 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 그 죄 중에 행한지라

sentences.original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord
following the ways of his father
his father had caused Israel to commit
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지가 이스라엘로 범하게 한 죄였더라
